cn.header_subtitle: 将东南亚玩家带到您身边
cn.header_section_desc: PlayPark 遍布东南亚，提供丰富与多样游戏。目前，我们已经在以下国家建立了PlayPark的名誉。
cn.secvice_btn5: 线下活动 ＆ 电竞赛事
cn.p2_menu_list4: 线下活动 ＆ 电竞赛事
cn.sec1_para_desc_1: 我们的服务确保身临其境的游戏体验，由训练有素的 GM 管理游戏内活动、鼓励玩家互动并提供实时支持，创建充满活力的游戏社区。
cn.sec1_para_desc_2: 本地化不仅仅涉及翻译；我们还会根据当地风格调整内容、对话和文案。确保玩家感到与游戏紧密相连、积极参与，提高留存率和满意度。
cn.sec1_para_desc_3: 这些服务共同提供了针对我们的市场和当地观众量身定制的价值和最好的游戏体验。
cn.sec2_para_title: 将您的受众与你的品牌连接起来
cn.sec2_para_desc_1: 成功的核心之一是能够将玩家请求逐级发送到单一联系点。我们的本地团队拥有最先进的系统的支持，同时仍然对游戏充满热情。
cn.sec2_para_desc_2: PlayPark 拥有专业团队为客户提供服务，处理超过
cn.sec2_para_desc_3: 20年的项目管理经验，发布过无数游戏，
cn.sec2_para_desc_4: 凭借高技能和对深度游戏内容的丰富知识，我们可以提供实时支持、洞察内容并调整本地需求，为他们找到最佳解决方案。
cn.sec3_para_desc_1: 我们为各大本地媒体平台提供创意、视觉设计和内容策划服务，包括 Facebook、TikTok、X 和 Discord 等大多数社交媒体渠道。利用这些平台结合创意内容也有助于推动安装并降低 eCPI。
cn.sec4_title: 线下活动 ＆ 电竞赛事
cn.sec4_para_desc_1: 提供全面的活动和eSports服务。从规划、组织到执行，我们专注于创造难忘的体验，在充满活力的现场活动和竞技游戏世界中吸引观众并提升品牌价值。
cn.sec5_para_title_1: 我们提供网红KOL的创意策略
cn.sec5_para_content_1_2: 我们根据客户的目标提供具有战略性，创造性和有影响力的营销解决方案。
cn.sec5_para_content_2_2: 通过利用KOL来扩大品牌影响力和参与度，我们能够在相关平台上识别、吸引和培养与其他知名KOL，以推动真实的联系并提高品牌知名度。
cn.sec5_para_content_3_2: 根据我们的游戏运营经验，我们可以帮助您分析和优化活动以获得最佳效果。
cn.sec6_para_desc_1: 我们提供优质的UA服务，并采用最新的跟踪和分析技术，随时监控用户获取活动的关键绩效数据。
cn.sec6_para_desc_2: 我们的数码营销服务还包括数码资产的视觉设计和数据激活，根据人口统计或行为数据创建个性化的受众群体，以便更好地定位广告，利用预测分析根据历史数据了解事件发生的可能性。
cn.sec7_para_desc_1: 我们为线上线下提供更多维度、高效影响的营销活动。多年来，我们与娱乐和游戏行业的主要公司建立了合作伙伴关系，为客户的业务创造了独特的协同效应。
cn.sec7_para_desc_2: 从我们 20 多年的经验，我们已彻底的研究市场，因此可以分析、规划和执行最佳行动方案。凭借我们与主要和本地合作伙伴以及媒体的联系。
cn.sec8_para_title: 多种支付方式，给玩家最方便的服务
cn.sec8_para_desc_1: 安全直观的支付渠道确保每一步交易无忧。通过 PlayPark 区域合作伙伴提供服务。

en.header_section_desc: Spanning throughout Southeast Asia, PlayPark brings forth a diverse array of games. Presently,the company has strategically established PlayPark entities in the following countries
en.sec1_para_desc_1: Our service ensures an immersive gaming experience, with the well-trained game masters managing in-game events, moderating community interactions, and providing real-time player support, creating a vibrant gaming community.
en.sec1_para_desc_2: Localization involves more than translation; we adapt content, dialogues, and cultural references to suit local preferences. This ensures players feel connected and engaged, leading to higher retention and satisfaction.
en.sec1_para_desc_3: These services together deliver a seamless, authentic gaming experience tailored to our market and local audiences alike.
en.sec2_para_desc_1: Single point of contact who be able to cascade customer requests is another core to success, with a state-of-the-art system managed by local staffs who know both game and players.
en.sec2_para_desc_2: PlayPark has specialized teams to serve and handle the customer with more than
en.sec2_para_desc_3: 20 years of experience in project management with countless games,
en.sec2_para_desc_4: with a highly skilled and knowledgeable in deep game content we can offer real-time support, insight content and adjust the needs of each player to find the best solution for them.
en.sec3_para_desc_1: We provide services for creative, visual design creativity, and content planning for each local media platform including the majority of social media channels such as Facebook, TikTok, X, and Discord. Utilizing these platforms combined with creativity content would also help drive install and lower eCPI.
en.sec4_para_title: Competitive Gaming at its Finest Live!
en.sec4_para_desc_1: Offering comprehensive event and esports tournament services. From planning and organization to execution, we specialize in creating memorable experiences that captivate audiences and elevate brands in the vibrant world of live events and competitive gaming.
en.sec5_para_title_1: We Provide Influencer Creative-Strategy on Effectiveness
en.sec5_para_content_1_2: We provide strategically and creatively developed influencer marketing solutions based on the client’s goal.
en.sec5_para_content_2_2: Leveraging influential personalities to amplify brand reach and engagement includes identifying, engaging, and nurturing relationships with key influencers across relevant platforms to drive authentic connections and increase brand visibility.
en.sec5_para_content_3_2: From our game-operated experience, we can help you analyze and optimize the campaign for the best result.
en.sec6_para_desc_1: We offer premium user acquisition services with the latest tracking and analytics technology to monitor key performance data of user acquisition campaigns at all times.
en.sec6_para_desc_2: Our digital marketing services also include a visual design for digital assets and data activation to creating personalized audience segments based on demographic or behavioral data for better ad targeting to leveraging predictive analytics to understand the likelihood of an event occurring based on historical data.
en.sec7_para_desc_1: We provide multi-dimensional & highly impact marketing campaigns for both online and offline. Years of partnerships with major companies in both the entertainment and gaming industries, we create a unique synergy effect for our clients’ businesses.
en.sec7_para_desc_2: From our experience over 20 years, we understand the market and therefore can analyze, plan, and execute the best course of action. With our connections to major and local partners and media outlets.
en.sec8_para_title: VARIETY OF PAYMENTS FOR PLAYER CONVENIENCE
en.sec8_para_desc_1: Secure and intuitive payment channel ensures hassle-free transactions at every step. Served through PlayPark region-wide partners.
